modName: Breezehome with basement no loadingscreen obsolete
descriptionHtml:
New Version:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10857

Update 8: No light issues anymore!

Update 7: What could be the reason why it is at the cooking place dark unless looking at the ceiling? Solved - Silly damn thing, edit the z-values from the light sources and then reedit them to previous values. YES, it\'s silly! But works!

Update 6: Advanced Mannequins work now! (navmesh)

Update 5: It is ready! Hope you enjoy it!

Update 4: Need help! What could be the reason why \"the same\" bookshelf works in the unownedcell but not at breezehome?

Update 3: Corrected somme clipping failure. I think the follow is a nice idea: I have some complicated things (like bookshelves and weapon/shield holders) stored in front of the house, you can copy them and paste where you want.

Update 2: Deleted the invisible object found by pressing F4 in CK (Collision Gemetry). 

Update: Solve problem by lowering the basement.

(Need help for the two light sources!)
I extend Breezehome with the CK to a basement. But there arre two annoying light sources (one of the campfire above and the other I don\'t know, watch the screenshots specially picture 5) How I  can make it that the lights aren\'t visible in the basement?
- Today I found it out, if you delete original things they are only invisible in the CK ingame they are outside the interiors, so the left light in the picture was only a deleted light! So only change the values from the original unwanted lights so: Radius 0 Fade 0 and maybeShodow Depth 0 ( so I made it in my mod!) 

THX
author: fruitgnome
